reviews.review: Super fun, I would herald Portal as a classic and more than worth the purchase. However, be wary if you're a person who goes out of their way to 100% games there is a bug where the achievement for completing two advanced stages doesn't register on steam.
The coolest gun in gaming doesn't even shoot bullets.

The storyline, mechanics, everything overall worked very well. If you're someone who likes a challenge in the sense that you need to get a series of choices correct in one try, this is not the game for you. Though there is the threat of dying, upon being damaged you essentially are brought back to where you already where, or at least where you last saved. It doesn't pose much of a danger, but nevertheless, attempting each puzzle along the way is mind boggling and super entertaining so I have nothing to say about it.

Only a couple of hours playtime. Neat puzzles. Great sense of humour. The graphics are starting to feel a little bit outdated by now, but that isn't really the point of this game. Find the secrets and get that cake!

Its fun and all, but this game should be free. The reason why Valve put it in the Orange Box was because it couldnt hold a price tag on its own lol. Its not worth $10, you can buy two packs of pbr tall boys with that money. Wait till its free or just move on.
This is a fun little puzzle game with unique mechanics and a good story. What more do i have to say.

Excellent game. Story, atmosphere, and mechanics are all top notch. Some timed challenges are a bit wonky in some of the later test chambers, but minimal annoyance overall.
Play it before Portal 2 (unlike me) - it works better as an introduction.
Price is a bit high for its length, but it goes on sale often.

This is a beautiful game!  There is so much to look at as well as the puzzles to solve.  I enjoyed the little touches like the differing sounds as the character walks on various surfaces.  This was an excellent place to begin PC gaming again after 25 years of being a boring grown up.  I definitely recommend it!

‚è©‚è©‚è©‚è©‚è©‚è©‚è©‚è©‚è©‚è©‚è©‚è©‚è©‚è©
Por donde empezar con esta joyita de saga.

‚ö°‚ö°‚ö°‚ö°‚ö°‚ö°‚ö°‚ö°‚ö°‚ö°‚ö°
===[ Historia y contexto ]===
‚ö°‚ö°‚ö°‚ö°‚ö°‚ö°‚ö°‚ö°‚ö°‚ö°‚ö°

 Este juego es la primera entrega de las dos que tiene la saga. Nos plantea una historia que parece no tener mucha importancia en el juego ya que se nos van ense√±ando poco a poco nuevas mec√°nicas con la pistola de portales. Basicamente eres un sujeto de pruebas en un laboratorio en donde todo el complejo es controlado por una inteligencia artificial. Mientras intentas escapar se te van soltando cachitos de historia que uno no se percata de ellos hasta finalizar la segunda entrega. 

‚ö°‚ö°‚ö°‚ö°‚ö°‚ö°‚ö°‚ö°‚ö°‚ö°‚ö°‚ö°‚ö°‚ö°‚ö°‚ö°‚ö°
===[ Gr√°ficos, dificultad, duraci√≥n y precio ]===
‚ö°‚ö°‚ö°‚ö°‚ö°‚ö°‚ö°‚ö°‚ö°‚ö°‚ö°‚ö°‚ö°‚ö°‚ö°‚ö°‚ö°

En cuanto a los gr√°ficos se ha de decir que el entorno est√° bastante bien ambientado.
Como es obvio la dificultad de los puzzles va aumentando llegando a algunos que pueden suponerte un reto. El juego en s√≠ es bastante corto (yo tard√© unas 10 horas intentando conseguir todos los logros). Por si se te hace corto el juego hay una serie de niveles o puzzles extras los cuales van desde intentar utilizar el m√≠nimo de portales, pasando por hacerlo lo m√°s rapido posible y hasta tocar el suelo lo menos posible. Lo √∫nico malo es que no tiene multijugador. El precio para lo que es el juego dir√≠a que es hasta barato.

En resumen:

Pros:
-Buena jugabilidad.
-Buenos gr√°ficos.
-Historia excelente.
-Dificultad progresiva y con posibilidad de jugar modos de juego exigentes.
-Buena calidad audiovisual.
-Buen precio

Contras:
-no tiene multijugador
-The cake is a lie :(

‚ö°‚ö°‚ö°‚ö°‚ö°‚ö°‚ö°‚ö°‚ö°‚ö°‚ö°
===[ Conclusi√≥n/reflexi√≥n ]===
‚ö°‚ö°‚ö°‚ö°‚ö°‚ö°‚ö°‚ö°‚ö°‚ö°‚ö°

Este juego no es como otros que encontrar√°s por ah√≠, realmente tiene algo especial que hace que te encari√±es con √©l. Sin duda mi juego favorito por como termina la saga. Cierto es que la primera entrega es bastante flojilla en comparaci√≥n con la segunda. Si puedes comprarlo, hazlo. Si est√°s leyendo esto es por dos razones, 1 porque te aburres y quieres ver lo que piensa la gente o 2 porque no quieres desperdiciar el dinero en un juego que no merece la pena. Si est√°s aqu√≠ por la segunda te recomiendo que te compres el juego porque merece realmente la pena por todo lo anterior que he dicho.

one of the best games i've ever played

Ok soo, Portal. This is a very very unique concept for a game. The story ,at first its not very captivating, but when you play more the story gets more and more interesting  and you really want just to get to the ending of the story. I need to mention that this is a puzzle game. So for a game that is 13 years old its still keeping up with today standars of a game.
I recommend buying the bundle which contains this game and the sequel.
